website_summaries.verdict: Expensive price, but delivers plenty of torque and control to loosen even toughest lug nuts.
pros: Includes built-in sockets for 17, 19, 21 milimeters, as well as three-quarter inch and half-inch" universal bit adapter for other sockets
Steel construction ensures this universal lug wrench will last a long time
Shaped like a cross wrench, but can be reconfigured for speed or to deliver more torque
cons: High price point versus some others
Shorter than some other lug wrenches

customer_reviews.title: Solid and compact
customer_reviews.text: Everything these guys make is quality. I have a power GRID device from this company and it's awesome. Decided to try this lug wrench because there's not much room on a tight flatbed trailer I use for work so this looked like it would tuck into the tube steel frame until I need it and it fits perfectly. First impression is this thing is super solid. It's heavy for its size. Opens up and snaps together in 5 seconds. No prob with heavy torque. It's not going to bend. Per tight spaces, there's nothing on the market like this. Probably going to pick up a few for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Shakes-n-bakes

customer_reviews.title: Not the most secure, but great concept.
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, but the "ball bearings" used to "secure" the two pieces together are very weak. Normally, you'd think of the push in style bearing, that provides more security so the two pieces won't slip. This just uses two very small ball bearings to hold one piece to the other. Playing with it with little pressure and you can easily slip past one bearing, and completely dismantle it. Imagine this happening when changing a tire? Presents a potential safety hazard. Beyond that issue, as said, very solid construction. Very compact. Cool concept, just wish it was more secure when creating the "+" or the "L" with a more robust bearing system.
customer_reviews.author: William M

customer_reviews.title: Freakin amazing
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so amazing that I'm compelled to write a review. It's compact, built well, designed well, pretty, and versatile. I was able to replace my whole wheel bearing primarily because of this tool. It integrates well with all my other tools, having a 1/2" socket receiver. It happens to be 1 foot long so it's easy to calculate torque based on weight applied. Very strong, was able to use it creatively without any bending. Totally worth having.
customer_reviews.author: EarthLaunch

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this garbage and spend your money on a reliable product
customer_reviews.text: Product is complete junk. The head sheared off the second time I used it to break my lug nuts off. My lugs are always torqued down to 88 ft lbs, which is per spec, but relatively low compared to some other vehicles. Lug wrenches should not break so easily. Amazon took it back with no questions even though it was past the regular return window. TL;DR complete junk, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke on second lug nut!
customer_reviews.text: The 19mm socket is not one piece with the bar, but attached at the end. On the second lug nut, the bar began to rotate in the socket, after a few rotations, it came off altogether. I was using it to replace a fixed spare in my driveway, so returned and ordered a different brand. If this had happened on the side of the road on my first use . . .
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality metal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wrench for its size and versatility but ended up disappointed. The 21mm socket broke on its first use. Really the first nut pulled itself apart. I’d like to think it was my hulk like physique that tore the metal apart but it isn’t, it’s just soft metal
customer_reviews.author: Alexander G. Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: Obviously this is one of those tools I'd hoped I wouldn't need to use, but I'm glad I was prepared! This did the job perfectly. I drive older vehicles and the lug nuts on that flat tire were extremely tight. I don't think I would've been able to get them loose if I didn't have this product with me. Took some strength for sure but the length and x form of this tool absolutely made it possible. I also like that the tool easily disassembles from an "X" to an "I" form to make storage easier. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stand in!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for my FJ Cruiser, when I bought it it had nothing to fit the lugs because the guy changed wheels and got the security lugs. I bought this and a 6 spline socket it worked perfect for me! Once you have the right tools it makes it considerably easier to do the job! This is very light and compact, stores away in the side compartment easily. Seems very sturdy for how light it is, and gives me the torque I need to get the lugs off. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Holmes

customer_reviews.title: It broke on first use, not super strong
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, compact but not super strong as stated. It broke first use! Socket broke off end of tube. not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Dan F.

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Any Car
customer_reviews.text: As the title says, anyone with a car needs this. The lug wrench that comes with most cars is ok, but removing lug nuts that have been tightened by a shop can be hard. This tool makes it much easier to loosen nuts, and I've tried it with Japanese, American, and European cars alike without any issues, as it includes lug sizes within the tool. All of the cars in my family have it already and I can't recommend it enough, as it is very high quality and very useful!
customer_reviews.author: Jose L.

customer_reviews.title: Got here in two days
customer_reviews.text: Works great, you can get a lot of torque. A lug wrench is a lug wrench, it all does the same thing so if you're smart you will spend 6 dollars on a normal one. Honestly, when does compacting something like this really matter because you usually throw it on top of your spare tire or whatever anyway. I like buying nice things that will last a long time and this from what i have seen is really good quality. I got it to keep in my enclosed cargo trailer and it works great. It comes together inside itself as one piece and would rather use this to "defend" myself than one of the huge clunky awkward X bars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and compact.
customer_reviews.text: This tire iron/lug wrench is cleverly designed and well made. I haven't used it yet but it is in the trunk next to the donut tire. I purchased this product after much research. I had a flat tire and the lug wrench was so short I could not break the nuts. Fortunately it was during the day and I was able to get roadside assistance. Now I feel more secure knowing it is in the trunk. Another benefit is the 3 sizes of sockets. I thought my (Mazda CX-5) used 17mm when in fact it is 21mm. And the three pieces fig nicely inside and into a tough bag.
customer_reviews.author: Terry F

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Leverage for your Wife or Daughter to loosen lug nuts!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a breaker bar that would enable my 17-year-old 100lb daughter to loosen the lug nuts on her truck. The lug nuts were torqued on by the tire shop. I was able to loosen them by standing on the bar but I weigh over 200lbs. No way she would ever be able to get them off with this tool. Wound up throwing this in my truck and ordering a 40" 3/4" drive breaker bar and Impact socket.  This tool is ok if you are a couple hundred pound guy but it's not going to cut it for wives and daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: well made tool but not for bigger SUVs or trucks
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this and was surprise at how well made it is. But, when I tried it on my SUV that requires 110 lb-ft of torque, it was bending a bit too much in the extended setup. At the end, I double checked with a torque wrench and the LugStrong hadn't reached 110 lb-ft, even though it was close. As others have mentioned in their reviews, this would be great for sedans but not for truck/SUV lug nuts that generally require torque values over 100 lb-ft.
customer_reviews.author: Ramin A.

customer_reviews.title: One of a kind!
customer_reviews.text: This LugStrong is a replacement for a previous one that was stolen. The earlier one was all chrome plated and had a nicer overall look to it. However, goofy red crossbar or not, this cleverly designed tool works just as well (superbly) as its predecessor. The red crossbar is hollow, and the silver one stores inside it...you can't get any more compact than that! The 1/2" socket adapter stores on the end of the silver crossbar, so make sure it doesn't drop unseen to the ground when assembling the wrench at night. Bottom line, I feel that the LugStrong would still be a bargain at twice the price!
customer_reviews.author: BS Buster

customer_reviews.title: Compact Storage, Solid Apparent Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the compact storage given that I drive a single cab truck. This fits much better than a traditional 4-way wrench behind the seat. While I haven't had to put it to use yet, the initial build quality seems great and I believe it could take some abuse. The design seems well thought out, in that you can swap any 1/2 in drive socket onto the interchangeable end to use this to break free stubborn studs/nuts/bolts in many situations.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Solid Item
customer_reviews.text: Excellen praduct. I was always used to the cruseta or cross wrench. Needed one for my truck but didn’t want a star wrench to b in my way. Awkward and clumsy I came across the GTE Lug strong and was sold. Solid ez to use and compact and plenty of leverage. Can not go wrong w this item. Quality Thumb up
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Great tool. Very well built. Compact and slim. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is awesome. Very flexible with different lug options, and if you need it, it has a 1/2" drive socket for any other socket. It's very impressive. I haven't had the need to use it yet. I bought it after I realized my summer lug nuts and winter lug nuts were different sizes. I was looking for a strong, but compact device i could store in my trunk. This fit the bill exactly. Very happy with it. I am looking forward to using it, when the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: David R Oslager

customer_reviews.title: LugStrong Lug Wrench "System"
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to using the LugStrong wrench. It works. Removed factory installed lug nuts,including the locking one with ease. My SUV has the painted aluminum rims and with the 1/2" drive adapter I was able to use a deep well socket that is designed not to scratch the rims. One reviewer mentioned a expandable breaker works as good .Try giving that breaker bar a spin as you can with this wrench with the cross pattern . I don't think so. And this wrench fits in a pouch that doesn't rattle sitting in the spare tire compartment. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: P H Factor

customer_reviews.title: Tire Iron Appears to Be Well Designed
customer_reviews.text: The tire iron appears to be well designed and built as advertised. I bought this as an emergency tool, 'piece of mind' approach in case of a flat tire. No one wants a flat tire but at least I have something durable to use. (4 stars only because I haven't used it, yet.).
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: A little more expensive but worth the extra
customer_reviews.text: The product was received in a very timely fashion. The construction quality is excellent and the materials are superior to other similar items I have purchased. The product also came in a very sturdy pouch and stores very easily with my spare tire.
customer_reviews.author: AC_Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Mind!
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this is worth every penny, but I'm only judging without using it. It's solid and made well, and it gives me piece of mind for when I do have to use it. It stores well and is compact and if you use some imagination you can find tons of places to strap it in securely. The only thing I'm not a fan of is the adapter. It's a great idea and still very helpful, but it would have been amazing if it could have been incorporated into the end of one of the irons. Not a show stopper though, and I am truly happy to have bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Lubbz

customer_reviews.title: If you're considering buying this product, buy it, you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a portable option that doesn't take up the huge room that the normal x style lug wrench does. it's is quality made and durable. The socket sizes are clearly printed on the ends of the wrench and it easily comes apart and goes together. But holds its collapsed form without falling apart. It's stronger than the other style collabsable lug wrenches where the sides flop down, as well as more compact. I've bought two for friends so far after they saw mine. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: ethen770

customer_reviews.title: Torque value good
customer_reviews.text: I have a heavy 5th wheel. The lug nuts are torqued to 90 foot pounds (very tight). I was able to break loose the lug nuts with the standard technique (4-way spinner mode). The quality is very good. Price a little high. It will fit in my tool box as well as under my seat with my issued jack kit. I might add a few more to my other vehicles if the price where lower. Good tool (I'm a tool guy).
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Not 26 inches
customer_reviews.text: Truth in advertising or specifications is essential for online merchants. This isnt a 26 inch lug wrench its 14 inches. I need a long lug wrench and was looking for something over 20 inches. This has a great design for storage, but thE dscription is wrong. How would the merchant feel if i paid in pesos raher than dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Belt

customer_reviews.title: Works great on F150 lug nuts
customer_reviews.text: Works great on F150 lug nuts. Nice and compact for folding and storing under a seat. The red paint rubbed off the end being used pretty quickly, to me that really doesn't matter. Just makes it more obvious which side to use. Like being able to use as an L for breaking the lugs then just an I for quick removal. Bought a second for the other car.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and I wish I was not so cheap, because I would have them in every vehicle. I carry one on my SxS full time and the other is in my trailer tool box. Has to be the most versatile tire tool around.
customer_reviews.author: PETRA

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding design and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, a compact X wrench replacement that is really well designed and built. This has all the functionality of an X tire wrench but with it's interlocking design can help get stubborn lug nuts off with ease. All in a compact package that goes into an equally well made nylon case. GREAT JOB GUYS!
customer_reviews.author: kj

customer_reviews.title: All the goodness of a 4-way + compact + sockets!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my lug nuts and had to get a new tire tool to fit them. I ended up getting this plus a 21mm socket. LOVE! ❤️ I liked it so much, everyone in the family now has one in their vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: One lug was hard to get off and the product broke first time I had to used it. Had to use wrench that came with the car, which worked.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Broke second time I used it!!
customer_reviews.text: Junk, it broke the second time I used it.... Don’t fall for all the obvious fake reviews on the garbage product!
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Works good for a couple times.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great before it broke only a week after getting trying to tighten my out lug nuts. Works good but the quality is trash.
customer_reviews.author: James Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Unit was defective - probably not representative of general quality...
customer_reviews.text: I received a defective unit, apparently. The wrench fitting separated from the shaft when I applied torque to the bar. It was not possible to apply enough pressure to begin to remove the first lug bolt prior the wrench breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Timo Sami

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and compact!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and sturdy. The breaker bar feature is essential as garages impact wrenches over tighten lugs. Excellent product! Thin socket walls a necessity on specialty wheels. I like it so much I'm ordering another!
customer_reviews.author: G. M. Kauger

customer_reviews.title: Compact and fits great in the trunk
customer_reviews.text: Compact and fits great in the trunk. Seems very well built, but hope I never have to really use it! Bought to go into a 1966 Ford Galaxie with new tires and custom lug nuts, so required thin walled wrench. No problem getting this onto the lugs (checked to make sure prior to storing it). Was a little puzzled about how to separate the two pieces, silver comes nested in the red, but realized they just needed to be pulled apart. Love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: ... wrench is a must have light yet feels very sturdy and has a precise fit to your lugs unlike ...
customer_reviews.text: this wrench is a must have light yet feels very sturdy and has a precise fit to your lugs unlike other lug wrenches that you can wiggle all around loosely and chance messing up your bolts not to mention I literally bought a flex head socket for this and can use this everywhere on the car get it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: make it easy to take them apart
customer_reviews.text: i tried for long to make the half inch drive lug nut tool to come out with no results. it was stuck . it was frustrating since i have to go on a long trip and i needed the tool. i had to give one star even though it seemed to be of good quality
customer_reviews.author: Artemis

customer_reviews.title: I'd like to counter one piece of feedback another reviewer made ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazingly well engineered piece of hardware. I'd like to counter one piece of feedback another reviewer made about the leverage you can attain with this device as the product picture is deceiving (in this case in your favor). You can configure the pieces to form an "L" which achieves maximum leverage. The photos show the product in the "+" configuration, which understandably gives you much less leverage. Although I hope that I never have to use this product while traveling, I have not doubt that it will provide great utility in actual practice.
customer_reviews.author: Warren M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived right on time, but at the great price, I had some doubts about it's quality. I've used it already to install locking lug nuts on my 2002 Honda CR-V and my doubts were totally unfounded. This is a strong, durable tool, that is well thought out in it's design. The carry bag is tough, well made material as well, with enough extra space for the lug nut key. I have already recommended it to friends and family. I will certainly be purchasing another!
customer_reviews.author: Julymorning

customer_reviews.title: Convertible Lug Wrench
customer_reviews.text: Clever, compact, easy-to-store lug wrench. Much better leverage than the L shaped, right angle wrench that usually comes with a vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Gadg'  guy

customer_reviews.title: This isn't your Daddy's lug wrench!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and compact. What more can I say. Those two words sum up this leg wrench. If you've changed your own tires you know its hard. The standard lug wrench that comes with your car works but, most of the time is to small and not balanced ( L shaped ) so it tends to slip off. Not LugStrong it comes in a small pouch so it will fit in your manufacturers tool kit hole. When assembled it is a balanced ( X shape ). You can push and pull at the same time giving your self more torque to remove those stubborn lug nuts. Check it out, you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Reesie

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much, I bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd LugStrong we've purchased (one for each Jeep), and we couldn't be happier. Though we haven't had occasion to use it just yet, it seems absolutely rock solid. Couple that with the small footprint it has, and it's nothing but a win-win! For Jeeps, it fits perfectly right into the compartment where the jack is housed, so it takes up no room at all. Just buy it... you'll thank me the first time you have to use it!
customer_reviews.author: MississippiGalNOK

customer_reviews.title: It's compact but have not tried jumping on this yet
customer_reviews.text: This is compact that's why I got it. It saves space on a pack rat's trunk. I haven't tried jumping on it yet to remove a flat tire -- hope it works and not break or bend when I do so. If it does not perform as expected, I'll update this post.
customer_reviews.author: Ro Yanis

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with the quality and how it stows
customer_reviews.text: The jack handle/lug wrench that came with my 2017 Ford Mustang did not look adequate. I purchased the Lugstrong for it's portability and functionality. I used it this weekend to rotate the tires. I'm very pleased with the quality and how it stows. Thumb up!
customer_reviews.author: David L. Dick

customer_reviews.title: Compact Lug Wrench
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy duty, and compact. Fast shipping. Will recommend this Compact Lug Wrench to all my 4X4 friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little lug wrench!
customer_reviews.text: Compact, strong with variable fittings. I didn't think I'don't have to review this so soon since I didn't think I'd be using it that quickly. Unfortunately, I had a flat and needed to use it. Works extremely well. Has it'seems own carrying case and every lug fitting has a place to be stored on the actual unit. I'don't definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: FSJ

customer_reviews.title: Well built, stores really well, awesome color. Love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, a full lug wrench in a small easily stored package. It's well built, I changed a couple tires with it as a test and it held up to me reefing on it, and I'm huge.
customer_reviews.author: Innocent Bystander

customer_reviews.title: The wrench that came with the vehicle was horrible and felt like it was bending
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a lug wrench after taking off my tires to replace the brake pads. The wrench that came with the vehicle was horrible and felt like it was bending. Did not want to get stuck somewhere with a broken lug wrench so I picked this up after reading the reviews. Compact, and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: so good. This is a well balanced and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. This is a well balanced and easy to use compact tool. I used it to break a few stubborn lugs free. Folds very compactly and fits well in the original lug wrench location. Much faster to change out a tire, no more re-positioning lug wrench.
customer_reviews.author: MacGyver Jr.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, well made, quality product! Will be purchasing one for all of my vehicles. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: fitzbod

customer_reviews.title: Good lug wrench
customer_reviews.text: Good lug wrench. Comes with a nice holder. It is a very slender head, so it fits in tight wheel holes. Easy to assemble and disassemble. Just insert one shaft into the hole. There are locking points to hold it strong inside the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Rico C

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Put one in my Jeep Wrangler. Stores away nicely, and unfortunately had to use it soon after when I picked up a nail. Worked very well, with good leverage.
customer_reviews.author: Phil H

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not durable at all. I had two of them and both of them broke. Not worth it for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good tool!
customer_reviews.text: a high quality product in every way. Fit and finish is excellent. Design is great and material is first class. If you need a compact, well made lug wrench, this is the one.. I will recommend this to friends and family. Its that good.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Snapped During First Use
customer_reviews.text: Went to use it for the first time and it snapped radially while removing the second lug nut. Must have been defective. Wish I could return it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool !
customer_reviews.text: Product is cool , Its cool you can adjust how you want to take a lug nut off and its strong !
customer_reviews.author: Mc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Lug Wrench...Best I've seen.
customer_reviews.text: It's much more than just a lug wrench. It is the most unique and frankly the best lug wrench / breaker bar / socket wrench I've seen. It's well made, easy to use, extremely strong, very versatile, compact and easy to store, unlike the usual star type lug wrench. I ordered two for myself and when I saw how nice they are, I purchased several more as gifts for my friends.
customer_reviews.author: S.J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great product
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly what I needed. It came with 3 metric sizes and a 1/2" socket adapter which is exactly what I needed. A regular 4 way lug wrench does not fit into the holes in my new rims but since I am able to use any 1/2" socket I am able to remove my lugs with ease. This lug wrench also has different configurations which allow you to get maximum torque out of the compact size. Also love how compact it is when it's stored away in its provided carrying pitch. Definitely recommend buying
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Tool...
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the coolest tool ever and it doesn't take up a lot of trunk space!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Parker

customer_reviews.title: One of the best lug wrenches
customer_reviews.text: I'm going with 5 stars. This lug wrench has a great design and loosened the lug nuts on my Tacoma no problem. You can certainly get cheaper lug wrenches but I wanted something compact with a storage bag. Another plus is a 1/2" adapter that lets you use a socket size of your choice. I doubt that I will need this with the sizes that come with the wrench.
customer_reviews.author: joshbenmichael

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well. Conveniently sized for storage. ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well. Conveniently sized for storage. If you have the space for a fixed crossbar, I would get a fixed one next time. Only reason being that the inner Rod can sometimes slide out of position while in use. But that is just the price of the convenience of storing it in a smaller space.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Jake

customer_reviews.title: Works well, decent price.
customer_reviews.text: Great space saving design,works well for smaller cars. Maybe not the best tool for a full size truck. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: buzz lightyear

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with this tool!
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced all of my lugs with this tool. I didn’t have to torque on it heavily since I did it at home and have a breaker bar and torque wrench. Regardless, it was a fantastic tool to use and I’m super psyched to get rid of the x lug wrench that bangs around in my trunk!
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

customer_reviews.title: This should be a perfect tool as long as the other reviews are true
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a Christmas gift. When it arrived, I noticed that it is in a pouch. This should be a perfect tool as long as the other reviews are true. Thank you for wanting to be sure I am a satisfied customer! I'm sure my daughter will love this new tool for her car! I am considering purchasing one for myself. Thanks for sending it out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price and take up much less room in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price and take up much less room in my trunk. Loosened a couple of lug nuts for a test and it worked very well. Seems to be substantially made, but only time will tell. Bought 2nd for the other car.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: great addition to my tundra tool box, use it on setup of RV, tires etc. buying another one for my wife's car
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E. Holley

customer_reviews.title: Quality. Bought three more for my other cars and trucks.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. This thing will hold up to hard use for a long time. Well made, good weight, solid build and packs up tight. Fits the lugnuts without extra play which is great for both the wrench and the nuts. Bought this for a miata I do frequent tire changes for auto cross, it doesn't chew up the lugnuts and works perfectly. Ended up buying more for our families other vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a 2008 Dodge Ram 1500
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a decently manufactured tool and a good idea but, IT DOES NOT FIT THE LUGS ON A 2008 DODGE RAM 1500 and had to send mine back. If it fits your vehicle , it looked to me like it would be a durable addition to your car's tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Stretch

customer_reviews.title: Cracked on the first use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lug wrench in the fall/winter. I just took it out to use it for the first time and it cracked on the first nut. If you do decide to buy one, test it out right away before the return window closes. Great concept and design, weak materials
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clever and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Cleverly crafted and well put together. I bought this to replace the usual awkward gear that comes with a new vehicle. I love that I can add a socket for the oversized lug nuts on my truck. I like that it dissembles for easy storage. Will probably buy another for the mini van.
customer_reviews.author: rwk

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and cool the way it's designed. Comes in handy needless to say.
customer_reviews.author: Victor M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a week ago so I could do my front brakes. Wasn’t looking forwards to not having any air tools, but this lug wrench made easy work of it. Got the lug nuts off my Chevy Impala with no problem. The ability to extend the handle for extra torque made all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Don B.

customer_reviews.title: Good For Its Purpose
customer_reviews.text: It's great and inventive for what it is. But I used it at one single track event and ended up buying a portable impact wrench the following weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As a lug wrench, its perfect... However...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best lug wrench to store in your trunk. However, I wish they remove the Red powder coating and change to bare silver or Anodize Colour. The paint simply peeling/flaking off every time I take it out from the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy storage.
customer_reviews.text: Surprised with the quality, well designed and made. easy to understand, and is also a versatile tool for other uses.
customer_reviews.author: P Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Not a large tire iron.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a good product. It feels heavy duty, and the martial will hold up, I'm certain. I do like how you can extend the arm all the way down the center shafts, depending on tire size, and how much power you need. Smart design.
customer_reviews.author: Peter R.

customer_reviews.title: Small foot print easy to store away
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Easy to put together and is compact when taken apart.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize that the silver Wrench part of this fit into the red handle, making this even easier to stow beneath my back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Drayton Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: SIZE MATTERS.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Feels solid. Compact. I'm certain it'll work very well. Doesn't fit the lug nuts on a '16 Tundra. I should have looked. My fault. Wife just got a lug wrench.
customer_reviews.author: 1guyzopinion

customer_reviews.title: Handy ATV wrench
customer_reviews.text: Great wrench to keep around, I have it in my trailbag/toolbox in the back of my RZR. I've already used it a couple of times and love that it collapses into a bag so it can be kept out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Az Dave

customer_reviews.title: Is perfect and exactly what I was looking for to replace ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was packaged correctly and received it in new condition. It works perfectly for my truck and the design allows it to be stored without using too much space. Is perfect and exactly what I was looking for to replace my previous 4-way lug nut wrench.
customer_reviews.author: H_Gamboa

customer_reviews.title: Great lug wrench.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lug wrench I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: cowboyblm

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It has two huge advantages over a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It has two huge advantages over a standard lug wrench. First, it disassembles easily so it's easy to carry in your car or truck. Secondly, the socket head on one end allows you to use a 1/2" socket to get the perfect fit on lug nuts and lug bolts, whether SAE or metric. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: GoPappy

customer_reviews.title: Swiss Knife of Lug Wrenches!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Definitely the Swiss knife of lug wrenches! Very compact for storage and very strong and numerous configurations and functions when assembled! Purchased for carrying in the side by side UTV. The compact size stores well in the tool kit.
customer_reviews.author: BG_NorCal

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding lug nut tool!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on all my 3 cars and they work really really well. Compact and yet very powerful. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dan L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have tons of little gadgets and/or accessories for my Jeep. This is one that I should have had a long time ago. Its super easy to store and because it comes apart it fits anywhere. It also feels very high quality. The hardest part was figuring out how to pull out the silver part lol. It's a must have tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: They perfect Lug Wrench
customer_reviews.text: They perfect Lug Wrench!! Love this tool and couldn't ask for it to be better !! It is small easy to use and fits just about any situation you would need a wrench for!! Just terrific!!
customer_reviews.author: James Escobar

customer_reviews.title: solid tool
customer_reviews.text: Well built and versatile but i dod have to go buy a 22mm socket for my truck lugs
customer_reviews.author: mspgh

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price, the 2x is a bit of bull, it is 2x compared to the t cross, but basically no more than a std lug wrench
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kleikamp

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This is the strongest, most versatile (nonprofessional) lug wrench I've ever used. It allows you to adjust leverage as needed. With the socket adapter you can use it for leverage on bolts as well. The best part of all is that it stores in a narrow space unlike traditional lug wrenches. My son and nephew love it as well so I ordered more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W Carter

customer_reviews.title: Improves your ability to remove lugnuts
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and better than what comes with the car.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R Sperling

customer_reviews.title: Great Opener
customer_reviews.text: Received on time. Great can opener. Sturdy and well built. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Edmunds

customer_reviews.title: definitely better than the one the came with the car - ...
customer_reviews.text: definitely better than the one the came with the car - fit lugs perfectly. packs up nice and small to fit in trunk with spare tire. Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Roland M. Ouellette

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if its low quality or if I am just unlucky. The silver rod that stores inside of the red rod is slightly bent, I cannot attach the socket adapter when storing in the carrying bag because of the bend in the rod. Will know more about the quality and if it bends easily when I use it to change my tires next month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline V

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Tool!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the design and the materials is head and shoulders above every other product on the market. Kudos to the people that envisioned such a remarkable tool!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lander

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tool. Non of the sizes fit but there is a universal adapter it comes with to put your own socket on my vehicle is metric and takes 22mm. I am really pleased with this product because it stores so nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool and ingenious design
customer_reviews.text: What an ingenious design! I haven't had a chance to use it yet, but the design is great and the tool itself appears to be made of quality materials with precision fitting components. Fits into a slim bag for storage just about anywhere. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: C. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Compact and well made
customer_reviews.text: The wrench is great! I bought it for my Jeep to replace another that didn't have an accurate 17 mm end. Lugstrong works well, is compact, and the leverage is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Wolverton

customer_reviews.title: Great piece!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, goes together great, nice quality metal. Maybe could be a little bit longer?
customer_reviews.author: drewp

customer_reviews.title: fits nicely in spare tire area
customer_reviews.text: Convenient collapse lug wrench. With its own case, fits nicely in spare tire area. Note all lug wrenches may to have the correct size to fit you wheel lug bolts. Know the size of your lug nuts before purchase
customer_reviews.author: MARS2020

product_meta.title: GTE Tools - LugStrong 26" Universal Compact Lug Wrench Set, Super-Strong Tire Iron & Lug Nut Remover - 2X More Torque!  Never Get Stuck on The Road Again!
feature_bullets: DO IT YOURSELF- LugStrong power wrench has the control of a 4 way lug wrench and more torque than a telescoping lug wrench, giving you the power needed to get yourself back on the road safely and quickly.
EVERYTHING YOU'LL NEED- – The most common standard sockets are built into this versatile lug nut wrench: 17mm, ¾”, 19mm, 21mm, and an adapter for any other socket you need to use.

PEACE OF MIND- Just store your LugStrong tire wrench set in your spare tire compartment; Whether you're changing your own flat or helping someone else on the road, you'll be prepared for any emergency anytime.
DOUBLE DUTY Ultra-strong steel construction, anti-slip grip, and rust-busting torque; this universal tire change kit doubles as a high-torque breaker bar!
GUARANTEED FOR LIFE- We designed LugStrong to be the last wheel lug wrench you ever need to own. Every wheel wrench we sell comes with a lifetime warranty.
